cause.description:
There are about 44 million people in the United States without Health Insurance. The United States should take some hints from other countries and support National Health Care. This Cause is to bring awareness to the obvious problem in our country.
It does not matter whether you are liberal or conservative, this issue affects everyone.
cause.mission: make it possible for every person in the United States to be completely taken care of medically.
cause.name: National Health Care Now
